                                     java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parses the input XML file and accesses the DOM structure
        Parameters:
        f - - File - the file to be parsed
        Returns:
        Document - the DOM structure extracted from the file
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - - thrown if there's a configuration issue with the document build
        java.io.IOException - - thrown if an IO error occurs when parsing
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - - thrown if any parse errors occur
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - thrown when the file is null

        public City getRandomCity(Graph g)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                          java.lang.IllegalStateException
        This gets a random city for the Ant to start on
        Parameters:
        g - - Graph - The graph with all the possible cities in
        Returns:
        City - The random city
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - If the graph is null, or the city list is null/empty
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - - If something has gone catastrophically wrong with picking a random city

      • runAntColonySim

        public double runAntColonySim(Graph graph,
                              int numAnts,
                              double evaporationRate,
                              double alpha,
                              double beta,
                              int terminationCount,
                              boolean elitism,
                              int rank,
                              boolean viewBestPath,
                              boolean viewBestEdgePath)
        The running method of the simulation. This takes in parameters, then evaluates the graph
        Parameters:
        graph - - Graph - the graph to be evaluated
        numAnts - - int - the number of Ant actors to be intialised
        evaporationRate - - double - the rate of which the pheromone should be evaporated
        alpha - - double - the effect the pheromone rate has on the path calculation
        beta - - double - the effect the weight of an edge has on the path calculation
        terminationCount - - int - the number of fitness evaluations until termination
        elitism - - boolean - to use the elitism adjustment of ACO
        rank - - int - to use the rank adjustment of ACO, the int is how many elite members
        viewBestPath - - boolean - if the user wishes to see the best path found
        viewBestEdgePath - - boolean - if the user wishes to see the best path found with weights
        Returns:
        double - the best fitness of the graph found.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method, take in user input and initialise Graph before running the ACO
        Parameters:
        args - - String[] - any additional command line args
